summary: This document is a chain of emails from 2019-2020 between a tipster and an NYPD detective. The tipster provides information about a former roommate who allegedly worked for Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell from 1991-1998, recruiting girls and being involved in their operation. The tipster seeks to connect with prosecutors on the Maxwell case after completing the Epstein Victim's Fund Program.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the case for whom the tipster's former roommate allegedly worked from 1991-1998.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Allegedly worked with the tipster's former roommate in recruiting girls for Epstein's operation since 1991.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned as having been massaged by the tipster's former roommate in Martha's Vineyard in the early to mid-1990s.

connections.description: Maxwell is described as working with Epstein in an operation where girls were recruited, with the tipster's roommate being part of it.
The roommate allegedly knew Maxwell very well and worked with her recruiting girls for Epstein for 8-10 years in the 1990s.
The roommate allegedly worked for Jeffrey Epstein from 1991-1998.
The roommate allegedly massaged Prince Andrew in Martha's Vineyard in the early to mid-1990s.

events.title: Roommate's Employment with Epstein
events.description: The tipster's former roommate allegedly worked for Jeffrey Epstein and with Ghislaine Maxwell during this period, involved in recruiting girls.

events.title: Massage of Prince Andrew
events.description: The tipster's former roommate allegedly massaged Prince Andrew in Martha's Vineyard.

events.title: Tipster Completes Victim Fund Program
events.description: The tipster informs the detective they have completed the Epstein Victim's Fund Program and are no longer bound to communicate through attorneys about their roommate.

keyFacts: A tipster provides information about a former roommate who allegedly worked for Jeffrey Epstein and with Ghislaine Maxwell from 1991-1998, recruiting girls for their operation.
The tipster's former roommate allegedly massaged Prince Andrew in Martha's Vineyard in the early to mid-1990s.

The tipster states that after completing the Epstein Victim's Fund Program, they are no longer bound to communicate through attorneys and wish to provide information to prosecutors on the Maxwell case.
The tipster emphasizes the role of women in the operation, stating young girls would not have gotten involved without women earning their trust.
